name: AnxietyDisorder(GAD-7)
0:
”Alexa, open Anxiety Disorder”
”Alexa, launch Anxiety Disorder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anxiety disorder
des:
The Generalized Anxiety Disorder-7 (GAD-7) test is freely distributed by Pfizer to help determine if a person is likely to have social anxiety disorder. This test is usually administrated through a written form. Use this test as a preliminary test to determine if you suffer from this disorder. 

The test can help measure the severity of the disorder over the last two weeks. The scale uses a score system as shown below.

Not at all (0 points)
Several days (1 point)
More than half the days (2 points)
Nearly every day (3 points)


Remember, this test does not replace a professional psychiatrist.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
